name: Coffee Holdings Co., Inc.
description: Coffee Holdings Co., Inc. is a prominent coffee roaster and distributor based in the United States, specializing in the sourcing, roasting, and packaging of high-quality coffee products. Founded in 1971, the company has built a solid reputation for its commitment to providing exceptional coffee experiences. Coffee Holdings operates through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Coffee Holding Co., Inc., which focuses on various segments of the coffee industry, including wholesale coffee sales, private label services, and retail operations. The company sources beans from some of the world's most renowned coffee-growing regions, ensuring a diverse and premium selection that caters to different consumer preferences. With a robust portfolio that includes both traditional and specialty coffees, Coffee Holdings continually innovates to meet the evolving demands of the market. The company places a strong emphasis on sustainability and ethical sourcing practices, engaging with farmers and suppliers to promote environmentally friendly farming methods. Coffee Holdings is dedicated to contributing positively to the coffee community and ensuring a sustainable future for coffee production. As a publicly traded company, it aims to deliver value to its shareholders while maintaining high standards of product quality and customer service. With a strategic focus on expanding its market presence and enhancing operational efficiencies, Coffee Holdings is well-positioned for growth in the competitive coffee industry.

seo.meta_title: Coffee Holdings Co., Inc. | Premium Coffee Roaster and Distributor
seo.meta_description: Explore Coffee Holdings Co., Inc., a leader in the coffee industry specializing in high-quality coffee roasting and distribution. Learn about our commitment to sustainability and exceptional coffee products.

faq.question: What does Coffee Holdings do?
faq.answer: Coffee Holdings Co., Inc. specializes in the sourcing, roasting, and distribution of high-quality coffee products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Coffee Holdings?
faq.answer: The CEO of Coffee Holdings Co., Inc. is Andrew Gordon.

faq.question: Where is Coffee Holdings headquartered?
faq.answer: Coffee Holdings is headquartered in Staten Island, New York, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Coffee Holdings offer?
faq.answer: Coffee Holdings offers a range of products including whole bean coffee, ground coffee, single serve pods, and private label services.
